attributes.action: remove the forthcoming announced increase on fuel duty in the UK because of already high oil prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The tax should be removed because of already high petrol prices due to the price of oil. It is further unfair to make our (already high worldwide) petrol prices higher.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
